criteria: observations meaningful, accuracy, sufficient (i.e. sufficient replication based on the principles discussed in labs & lecture relevant to the design you used)
every variable or column clearly described
description ensures the process of observation be repeated by another

published data with meta-data to figshare with clear title, location, and details sufficient for open science (include url in PDF you submit for grading) and/or in PDF to turnitin include clear title to data, location, and details in a short paragraph only so that someone else can understand the experimental data you collected
